alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Knott; Magoffin; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry, Knott, west central Floyd, southeastern Breathitt and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Noble, or 11 miles southeast of Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Daisydell around 525 PM EDT. Buck, Decoy and Ary around 530 PM EDT. Talcum, Evanston and Fisty around 535 PM EDT. Elmrock, Bearville, Vail and Emmalena around 540 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hindman, Vest, Tina, Carrie, Soft Shell, Yellow Mountain, Bolyn, Handshoe, Leburn, Larkslane, Mousie, Garner, Ivis, Mallie, Brinkley, Bosco, Estill, Pippa Passes, Wayland, Raven, Hollybush, Betty, Glo, Porter Junction, Garret and Drew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
